remarks: The neighbors of a vertex in a graph with three elements are unordered pairs of the other vertices if and only if the graph is complete. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Oct-2017.)
statement:
cusgra3v.v $e |- V = { A , B , C } $.
cusgra3vnbpr $p |- ( ( ( A e. X /\ B e. Y /\ C e. Z ) /\ V USGrph E /\ ( A =/= B /\ A =/= C /\ B =/= C ) ) -> ( V ComplUSGrph E <-> A. x e. V E. y e. V E. z e. ( V \ { y } ) ( <. V , E >. Neighbors x ) = { y , z } ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d E x y z $.
$d V x y z $.
